name: OtterUI Project File
summary: Learn about .GGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OtterUI is a video game UI development toolkit that allows developers to create navigable menus and other animated scenes. These menus and scenes are saved within OtterUI projects, or GGP files.
A GGP file can contain any number of scenes, animations, and other scene elements. After a developer finishes editing a scene, they can export that scene as a .GBS file for use in a video game.

instructions: You can open a GGP file in OtterUI Editor (Windows). To do so, select File â†’ Open from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your GGP file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
